txt.en: Thargaun can be found at Ufurok in Thuringwath.\n\nYou should confront Thargaun there.
The Altar of Death can be found in the Circle of Death in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should enter the Altar of Death.
'I have been bound to this Vale too long. The time has come to leave my master's domain.'
Thargaun can be found at Ufurok in Thuringwath.\n\nYou should seek out Thargaun there.
'Soon, I shall no longer be bound by defeat, and my armies shall march across Mordor!'
Thargaun can be found at Ufurok in Thuringwath.\n\nYou should trap Thargaun.
'What have you done?! I can not move!'
'You have been nothing but trouble for me, [placeholder]. No matter! Soon I shall have a servant and a proper body to leave this Vale and lead the dead to conquer Mordor! You are too late this time!'
'Uuuurgh! No!'
Thargaun's ritual can be found at Ufurok in Thuringwath.\n\nYou should stop Thargaun's ritual.
Confront Thargaun
Trap Thargaun with the stones of defeat!
Rally points can be found throughout the Morgul Vale.\n\nYou should seek out each rally point within the bounds of the Morgul Vale.
Stop Thargaun's ritual
Seek out the rally points of the Morgul Vale ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
For those reclaiming Minas Ithil from the grasp of darkness, a trial of death has begun.
Seek out Thargaun at Ufurok
Thurindol can be found at Echad Uial.\n\nYou should talk to Thurindol.
TBD
The Orb of Death be found at Ufurok in Thuringwath.\n\nYou should destroy the Orb of Death.

'Our scholars have shared with me the final texts they were able to decipher. It would seem there are only five artifacts which we seek to destroy. You have done well in destroying the first four, [placeholder]. I am sure that you will be victorious in this final task.\n\n'The final artifact rest upon an altar in the Circle of Death. Quickly now, we must get to it before anyone else.'
TBD
Ufurok can be found in Thuringwath.\n\nYou should defeat foes at Ufurok so that your confrontation with Thargaun will be met with fewer surprises.
The Altar of Death can be found in the Circle of Death in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should examine the conflict around the altar.
Destroy the Orb of Death
There was a recent conflict here. The artifact is missing!
The Altar of Death can be found in the Circle of Death in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should examine the altar.
The corpse falls as Thargaun watches on in anger
Defeat foes at Ufurok ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A vision of the conflict is revealed
Examine the altar

'To think that Thargaun was so closely tied to these artifacts. That explains why he could not leave the Vale nor perish. Now that all five artifacts are destroyed, I do not believe we shall ever see Thargaun again.\n\n'We should rejoice on this day [placeholder]! You have torn down the veil of sorcery upon Minas Morgul. Now the evil will surely fade and our reclamation of Minas Ithil will succeed in time. We thank you for your assistance. I do not believe we could have made it this far in our goals without you. For Gondor!'
Vale of Sorcery: The Trial of Death
If Thargaun is bound to the Vale in defeat, perhaps defeat itself prevents him from leaving
You are too late. The corpse rises out of the flame
Enter the Altar of Death
Thargaun can be heard chanting atop the structure of Ufurok
Talk to Thurindol
Thargaun howls as he disintegrates along with the artifact
Examine the conflict around the altar
Gathered stones of defeat ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated foes at Ufurok ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
